sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"基础"之意。
means: base ： 侧重指构成或支撑某一具体物体的基础，也可指军事基地或用作比喻意义。
basis ： 主要用作抽象或引申意义。
foundation ： 用于具体意义时，侧重指坚固结实的建筑物的基础或地基；用作比喻意义时，与basis基本相同。
ground ： 含义与basis和foundation接近。一般指某种决定、论点或关系的基础，也可指某种原因的基础。

word_mean: 希］〔复bases〕基底，底：物体的下面的，基本的或基础部分
〔NA〕解剖学上的一般名称，用以指结构或器官的基底，与尖端部分相对立或相区别

sentence.Network_en: Any action on the basis of such fragmentary evidence would be foolish.
sentence.Network_cn: 基于如此不完整的证据采取的任何行动都是愚蠢的。

sentence.Network_en: All vessels were to be built on a cost-plus basis.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的船只都将在成本加利润的基础上制造。

sentence.Network_en: Liverpool grew fat on the basis of the slave trade.
sentence.Network_cn: 利物浦是靠奴隶贸易肥起来的。

A happy marriage built on mutual trust basis ., 美满的婚姻建立在互相信任的基础上.
依字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 依旧〖 asbefore;still〗 依据〖 foundation;basis〗 依据〖 listento;complywith〗.

list.abs: 按照此一概述，可以将此原则理解为“权责发生制（accrual basis）“————指取得收到现金的权利或支付现金的责任权责的发生为标志来确认本期收入和费用及和————的一部.
电子英语_最终幻想_新浪博客 ... thin laminate 薄层压板 basis material 基体材料 prepreg 预浸材料.
印刷用纸 ... 九．不透明度( Opacity) 一．定量( Basis Weight) 三． 抗张强度和伸长率( Tensile Strength).
股票与证券行业英语词汇 ... barometer 晴雨表，[喻]标记，指标 basis point 基点（一个百分点的百分之一） bear markets 熊市.
金融英语 - 金融学考研论坛 ... Basel Capital Accord 巴塞尔资本协议 Basis point 基点；点子 Basis swap 基准掉期.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a base or pedestal): via Latin from Greek, stepping'. Compare with base

entry.def: If something is done on a particular basis, it is done according to that method, system, or principle.

example.ex: We're going to be meeting there on a regular basis...
example.tran: 我们将定期在那里会面。

example.ex: The tea is prepared on a rota basis by the lady members...
example.tran: 女性成员轮流准备茶水。

entry.def: If you say that you are acting on the basis of something, you are giving that as the reason for your action.

example.ex: McGregor must remain confined, on the basis of the medical reports we have received...
example.tran: 根据我们收到的病历报告，麦格雷戈的行动仍然必须受到限制。

example.ex: On the basis that recognising the problem is halfway to a solution, Mulcahy's comments yesterday should be well received.
example.tran: 鉴于认识到问题的存在就相当于把它解决了一半，马尔卡希昨天的那番话应该会受到欢迎。

entry.def: The basis of something is its starting point or an important part of it from which it can be further developed.

example.ex: Both factions have broadly agreed that the UN plan is a possible basis for negotiation.
example.tran: 双方大致同意联合国的计划可能成为谈判的基础。

example.ex: ...the subatomic particles that form the basis of nearly all matter on earth.
example.tran: 构成地球上几乎所有物质的基础的亚原子粒子

entry.def: The basis for something is a fact or argument that you can use to prove or justify it.

example.ex: ...Japan's attempt to secure the legal basis to send troops overseas...
example.tran: 日本试图找到向海外派兵的法律依据

example.ex: This is a common fallacy which has no basis in fact.
example.tran: 这是一个没有事实依据的常见谬误。

means.word_mean: 1. a relation that provides the foundation for something;
2. the fundamental assumptions from which something is begun or developed or calculated or explained;

sentences.sentence: "the whole argument rested on a basis of conjecture"

means.word_mean: 3. the most important or necessary part of something;

sentences.sentence: "the basis of this drink is orange juice"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bas低下,基础+ic形容词结尾→adj.基本的,基础的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 男低音[歌手];低音乐器;低音大提琴
stems_affixes.word_buile: bas低下,基础+s表示sound→n.男低音[歌手];低音乐器;低音大提琴
bass=bas低下,基础+oon表名词→n.低音管,巴松

Sentence.sentence: That's why historically we see an increase in romantic love as a basis for forming long-term relationships," she says.
On the basis of the police report, the Lummis Accident Committee correctly determined that McLaughlin had been quite careless.
BASIS in Tucson, with only 120 high-schoolers and 18 graduates this year.
They form a solid basis for policy making.
I am responsible for financial development programs in many parts of the world, so forecasting long range trends and making predictions on the basis of present evidence is what I do.
Both of these things are also about making long-term predictions on the basis of present evidence

jushi.english: We judge a worker on the basis of his performance.
jushi.chinese: 我们根据工作表现评价工人。

jushi.english: We run the meals-on-wheels service on a voluntary basis.
jushi.chinese: 我们根据自愿的原则，开展上门送饭的服务。
